title: Denmark
summary: Citi has had a presence in Denmark since 1975. Our business is focused on Danish-based multinational companies, financial institutions, the public sector as well as providing services to subsidiaries of foreign multinational companies operating in Denmark. For these companies, we are among their most important banks, and we work with them across the globe, making full use of our international network.
tag-2: Citi provides a full range of global financial services to Danish clients
